mapper.sql: select resource_id, resource_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, `query`, is_frame, is_cache, resource_type, visible, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_time from sys_resource
mapper.select: select distinct m.resource_id, m.parent_id, m.resource_name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.resource_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_resource m where m.resource_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.resource_id, m.parent_id, m.resource_name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.resource_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_resource m left join sys_role_resource rm on m.resource_id = rm.resource_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.resource_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from sys_resource m left join sys_role_resource rm on m.resource_id = rm.resource_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from sys_resource m left join sys_role_resource rm on m.resource_id = rm.resource_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_resource m left join sys_role_resource rm on m.resource_id = rm.resource_id where m.status = '0' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
select count(1) from sys_resource where parent_id = #{resourceId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource( resource_id, parent_id, resource_name, order_num, path, component, `query`, is_frame, is_cache, resource_type, visible, status, perms, icon, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{resourceId}, #{parentId}, #{resourceName}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{query}, #{isFrame}, #{isCache}, #{resourceType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
